mapper.insert: insert into fgo_servant (id, name_zh, name_en, name_jp, class, camp, star, atk_stage0, hp_stage0, cards, atk_stage4, hp_stage4, atk_lv_90, hp_lv_90, atk_lv_100, hp_lv_100, art_hit, buster_hit, quick_hit, etxtra_hit, painter, cv, Attributes, gender, region, height, weight, crit_star, crit, np_rate_art, np_rate_buster, np_rate_quick, np_rate_extra, origin, np_rate_attacked, nickname ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nameZh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameJp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{class,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{camp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{star,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{atkStage0,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hpStage0,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cards,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{atkStage4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hpStage4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{atkLv90,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hpLv90,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{atkLv100,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hpLv100,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{artHit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{busterHit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quickHit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{etxtraHit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{painter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attributes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{critStar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{crit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{npRateArt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{npRateBuster,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{npRateQuick,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{npRateExtra,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{npRateAttacked,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select id, name_zh, name_en, name_jp, class, camp, star, atk_stage0, hp_stage0, cards, atk_stage4, hp_stage4, atk_lv_90, hp_lv_90, atk_lv_100, hp_lv_100, art_hit, buster_hit, quick_hit, etxtra_hit, painter, cv, Attributes, gender, region, height, weight, crit_star, crit, np_rate_art, np_rate_buster, np_rate_quick, np_rate_extra, origin, np_rate_attacked, nickname from fgo_servant

select id, name_zh, name_en, name_jp, class, camp, star, atk_stage0, hp_stage0, cards, atk_stage4, hp_stage4, atk_lv_90, hp_lv_90, atk_lv_100, hp_lv_100, art_hit, buster_hit, quick_hit, etxtra_hit, painter, cv, Attributes, gender, region, height, weight, crit_star, crit, np_rate_art, np_rate_buster, np_rate_quick, np_rate_extra, origin, np_rate_attacked, nickname from fgo_servant WHERE id=#{userId}
